title: Who are the judges on the hit singing show The Voice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since no one is stepping up to the plate I’ll take a swing. I’ve watched every season of the Voice and it’s one of my favorite shows. Blake Shelton. Winner of 9 CMA awards, 4 ACMA awards, and too many others to count.List of awards and nominations received by Blake Shelton - Wikipedia . He’s the country guy and gets most all of the country singers on his team. The other judges are constantly bemoaning the fact that they can’t persuade those singers to choose them. His singers have won The Voice six times.Kelly Clarkson. Famous for being the first winner of American Idol and winning three Grammy awards and numerous others. She’s known for being able to “sing the phonebook”, that is, practically anything. Last year was her first and her singer won the Voice.John Legend. Winner of 10 Grammy awards and the first black man to win an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony award. He’s won numerous other accolades. This is his first season on the Voice and it appears the other judges are afraid of him. All three used their blocks on him.Adam Levine. He has received three Grammy awards, three AMAs, four Billboard Music awards, an MTV Music award and a World Music Award. His singers have won the Voice three times. He tends to get the more eclectic or unusual singers on his team.
